RULE.DESCRIPTION: This policy takes as input the IoT devices from the Enterprise Discovery policy.
RULE.NAME: 1.1.02 IoT Discover

INNER_RULE.DESCRIPTION:
Normally additional processing is not done on detected NAT devices, as they are usually against the AUP., hence the add to group action is disabled.
This sub-rule quickly identifies any NAT devices on the network so that IT staff can remove them from the network.
INNER_RULE.NAME: NAT Devices

RULE.DESCRIPTION: Looks for host in the Passive_Learning segment and automatically adds them to the Passive Learning group - this disables all active scans for those hosts. Admission resolve delay is 1 second in order to catch devices as soon as they are admitted to the network.
RULE.NAME: 1.1.00 Discover Method
